text: free drinks liquor manufacturers amend rsa to read as follows notwithstanding paragraph i wine manufacturers beverage manufacturers nano breweries liquor manufacturers and brew pubs may provide samples for tasting to persons of legal drinking age at a farmers market provided they have received written authorization by the town or city s governing body which authorization shall remain effective until revoked in writing and they have provided the commission with a copy of that authorization provision of samples shall be restricted to clearly defined areas approved by the commission samples shall be limited to one sample per label per person for any beer specialty beer or cider and one sample per label per person for any wine and sample per label per person for any liquor liquor manufacturers license amend rsa iv to read as follows a liquor manufacturer may provide to visitors of legal drinking age at its facility samples of liquor manufactured on the premises for tasting samples may be provided either free or for a fee and shall be limited to one sample per label per person samples sold under this section shall be subject to fees as established in paragraph a liquor manufacturer that produces fewer than bottles during their licensing year and that operates and produces liquor solely within the state may transport to and sell its products at a farmers market at retail in the original sealed containers and may offer samples as provided in this paragraph
